title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1409/96 of 19 July 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1442/93 laying down detailed rules for the application of the arrangements for importing bananas into the Community, as regards eligibility criteria for category C operators and certain dates relevant to the administration of Community tariff quotas
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1409/96 of 19 July 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1442/93 laying down detailed rules for the application of the arrangements for importing bananas into the Community, as regards eligibility criteria for category C operators and certain dates relevant to the administration of Community tariff quotas
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 July 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
